code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from"react";import{SidebarContext}from"../contexts/SidebarContext";import{CartContext}from"../contexts/CartContext";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import Logo from"../img/logo.svg";import{BsBag}from"react-icons/bs";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isActive,setIsActive]=useState(false);const{isOpen,setIsOpen}=useContext(SidebarContext);const{itemAmount}=useContext(CartContext);useEffect(()=>{window.addEventListener("scroll",()=>{window.scrollY>60?setIsActive(true):setIsActive(false);});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"".concat(isActive?"bg-white py-4 shadow-md":"bg-none py-6"," fixed w-full z-10 lg:px-8 transition-all"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto flex items-center justify-between h-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-[40px]",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Logo,alt:""})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen),className:"cursor-pointer flex relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BsBag,{className:"text-2xl"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-red-500 absolute -right-2 -bottom-2 text-[12px] w-[18px] h-[18px] text-white rounded-full flex justify-center items-center",children:itemAmount})]})]})});};export default Header;
